live_updates: Technicians continue working diligently to permanently resolve this issue with intermittent services.  Thank you for your continued patience.
Technicians continue work to stabilize services in the area. We thank you for your patience as our agents work on this intermittent challenge.
Our field agents have been able to track down the source of the interference. Arrangements are being made to access the property to make required repairs.

Our field technicians have identified signal disruption in your area. Although services are working they may experience slowdown or pixilation. Out agents are being dispatched to identify the source of this issue to begin repairs.
34005.summary: Some customers in the Evergreen area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34005.title: Feb 22 - Saskatoon (Evergreen) | Service Issues (Fix in Progress)
